outerHTML:
Homepage LXC

Homepage is a self-hosted dashboard solution for centralizing and organizing data and information.

To create a new Proxmox VE Homepage LXC, run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell.
To Update Homepage, run the command below (or type update) in the LXC Console.

bash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/homepage.sh)"

⚡ Default Settings: 1GB RAM - 3GB Storage - 2vCPU ⚡

Configuration (bookmarks.yaml, services.yaml, widgets.yaml) path: /opt/homepage/config/

Homepage Interface: IP:3000
